bio:
Kevin is a data scientist with severals years of experience in the energy and urban mobility industries. He co-founded an energy startup, TouchLight, which manages residential energy usage for solar optimization with machin learning based software. Previously, Kevin worked as a founding member of the data science team at Gogoro, where he created dynamic energy algorithms for the battery swapping network that managed over 500 MWh of energy.
###### 
Kevin received both his B.S. and M.S. in Materials Science from Northwestern University, where he focused on electrochemical energy storage technology. His research was focused on degradation mechanisms of solid oxide fuel cells. He is from Cupertino, California.
